I1.name: Unseen Predator
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Rengar''' generates {{as|1 Ferocity|buzzword3}} upon casting a [[Champion ability|basic ability]] or using ''{{ais|Savagery|Rengar}}'' first attack. At {{as|4 Ferocity|buzzword3}}, his next [[Champion ability|basic ability]] consumes them to become empowered with an additional effect and grant him an additional cast along with {{pp|key=%|30 to 50 for 3|1 to 13|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Reaching {{as|4 Ferocity|buzzword3}} with ''{{ai|Savagery|Rengar}}'' or ''{{ai|Bola Strike|Rengar}}'' locks them from use for {{fd|0.1}} seconds before and after casting. All {{as|Ferocity|buzzword3}} is lost after 10 seconds of being [[combat status|out of combat]].

{{sbc|Unseen Predator:}} '''Rengar's''' [[basic attack]]s have massively increased range and cause him to {{tip|dash|leap}} to the target's location, attacking the target upon arrival and landing closer than his normal {{tip|melee}} range. This generates {{as|1 Ferocity|buzzword3}} if '''Rengar''' had {{as|0 Ferocity|buzzword3}} at one point. ''Unseen Predator'' lingers for {{fd|0.35}} seconds upon exiting brush but is lost immediately if '''Rengar''' casts {{si|Flash}} or {{si|Hexflash}} to do so.

'''Rengar''' can cast any of his abilities during the dash.

{{sbc|Innate - Bonetooth Necklace:}} Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy {{tip|champion}} within 3 seconds of damaging them grants '''Rengar''' a '''Trophy''', once per unique champion and up to 5. An [[File:Head of Kha'Zix.png|20px|border|link=]] additional one is made available through the event [[The Hunt is On!]] '''Trophies''' grant {{as|{{pp|type=[[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green.png|20px|border|adjustsize|link=]] trophies|key=%|x^2 for 6|x;Head of Kha'Zix|formula=(Number of Trophies) * (Number of Trophies)}} '''bonus''' AD}} as {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}.
I1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Rengar generates 1 Ferocity upon casting a Champion ability or using Rengar's Savagery first attack. At 4 Ferocity, his next Champion ability consumes them to become empowered with an additional effect and grant him an additional cast along with 1 to 13 ‒ undefined bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds. Reaching 4 Ferocity with Rengar's Savagery or Rengar's Bola Strike locks them from use for 0.1 seconds before and after casting. All Ferocity is lost after 10 seconds of being combat status.
Innate: While in brush, Rengar gains Unseen Predator.
Unseen Predator: Rengar's basic attacks have massively increased range and cause him to leap to the target's location, attacking the target upon arrival and landing closer than his normal melee range. This generates 1 Ferocity if Rengar had 0 Ferocity at one point. Unseen Predator lingers for 0.35 seconds upon exiting brush but is lost immediately if Rengar casts Flash or Hexflash to do so.

Rengar can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
Innate - Bonetooth Necklace: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them grants Rengar a Trophy, once per unique champion and up to 5. An File:Head of Kha'Zix.png additional one is made available through the event The Hunt is On! Trophies grant x;Head of Kha'Zix ‒ undefined bonus AD as bonus attack damage.
I1.notes:
* '''Rengar''' will not leap to targets already in his normal [[basic attack]] range.
* While {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}, '''Rengar''' loses the enhanced {{sti|attack range}} from ''Unseen Predator''.
* '''Rengar''' will only leap to a target if his basic attack timer has been refreshed (if not so he will not automatically attempt to path towards his target, despite them being within leap range).
* Only {{si|Flash}} and {{si|Hexflash}} instantly end ''Unseen Predator''. Other effects (i.e {{si|Teleport}}) will still cause the buff to linger upon leaving {{tip|brush}}.
* '''Rengar''' can freely use any [[champion ability|abilities]], [[summoner spell]]s, or [[active ability items|item actives]] while leaping.
** Using a {{tip|dash}} or {{tip|blink}} ability will interrupt the leap.
* The leap's attack will have no effect if the target dies or becomes {{tip|untargetable}}. {{ais|Savagery|Rengar}} empowered attack will always be consumed.
* The attack from the leap will:
** ''Not'' go off if the dash was interrupted.
** Go off at the end of the dash even if its normal destination is obstructed by boundaries he cannot cross (e.g. terrain, {{ai|The Hextech Ultimatum|Camille}}).
** Go off regardless of distance the enemy travels away from '''Rengar's''' original location.
** Go off even if '''Rengar''' loses {{tip|sight}} of the target.
* {{iis|Rapid Firecannon}} and {{ais|Savagery|Rengar}} '''bonus''' ranges are lost after {{fd|0.25}} seconds upon gaining ''Unseen Predator'', and are re-gained after {{fd|0.25}} seconds upon losing ''Unseen Predator''.
* '''Rengar''' has a resource bar that indicates how much {{as|Ferocity|buzzword3}} he currently has.
* ''Bonetooth Necklace'' uses different icons corresponding to the number of stacks acquired: 
** {{sbc|1 Stack:}} [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green.png|20px|border|link=]] 
** {{sbc|2 Stacks:}} [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green 2.png|20px|border|link=]]
** {{sbc|3 Stacks:}} [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green 3.png|20px|border|link=]]
** {{sbc|4 Stacks:}} [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green 4.png|20px|border|link=]]
** {{sbc|5 Stacks:}} [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green 5.png|20px|border|link=]]
** {{sbc|6th Stack:}} [[File:Head of Kha'Zix.png|20px|border|link=]] '''Head of Kha'Zix'''

Q.name: Savagery
description:
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Rengar's''' next two basic attacks within 3 seconds gain {{sti|{{as|40% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.

His next basic attack has an {{tip|uncancellable windup}}, gains {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' range}}, and deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, reduced by 40% against [[structures]]. This attack will {{tip|critically strike}} (not affected by {{as|critical strike damage}}) and the damage is increased by {{as|{{pp|key=%|key1=%|type=critical strike chance|0 to 66 for 11|0 to 100|formula=0.66% per 1% critical strike chance}}|critical chance}}.
{{sbc|Ferocity Bonus:}} ''Savagery's'' damage is modified. '''Rengar''' gains {{as|{{pp|key=%|50 to 101}} {{sti|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds.
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rengar's next two basic attacks within 3 seconds gain 40% bonus attack speed.

His next basic attack has an uncancellable windup, gains 25 bonus range, and deals bonus physical damage, reduced by 40% against structures. This attack will critically strike (not affected by critical strike damage) and the damage is increased by 0 to 100 ‒ undefined.
Ferocity Bonus: Savagery's damage is modified. Rengar gains 50% − 101% (based on level) bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.
Savagery resets Rengar's basic attack timer.
leveling: {{st|{{tt|Bonus Physical Damage|The wiki denotes only the bonus damage, not the total scaling}}|{{ap|30 to 150}} {{as|(+ {{ap|0 to 20}}% AD)}}}}
{{st|Empowered Bonus Physical Damage|{{pp|30 to 135 for 8; 145 to 235|formula = 15 + 15 per level until level 8, then + 10 per level}} {{as|(+ 40% AD)}}}}
Q.notes:
* With {{ii|Infinity Edge}}, ''Savagery's'' damage amplifier is increased to {{as|{{pp|key=%|key1=%|type=critical strike chance|59.4 to 99 for 5|60 to 100|changedisplay=true|formula=0.99% per 1% critical strike chance}}|critical chance}}.
* ''Savagery's'' empowered attack is not consumed by [[jungle plants]].
* The enhanced attack applies other {{tip|on-hit}} effects as well as {{stil|life steal}} as normal (the bonus damage cannot).

effects.str: • Bonus Physical Damage: (+ % AD)

st_slices: Bonus Physical Damage

subeffects.title: Bonus Physical Damage

effects.str: • Empowered Bonus Physical Damage: 30 − 135 for 8; 145 (based on level) (+ 40% AD)

W.name: Battle Roar
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Rengar''' stores 50% of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} he has taken in the last {{fd|1.5}} seconds as [[Health#Grey health|grey health]] on his [[health bar]], increased to 100% of damage taken from {{tip|monsters}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Rengar''' roars, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies and {{as|{{pp|65 to 130}} '''bonus''' magic damage}} to {{tip|monsters}}, and consuming his [[Health#Grey health|grey health]] to {{tip|heal}} for the same amount.
{{sbc|Ferocity Bonus:}} ''Battle Roar's'' damage is modified. '''Rengar''' {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} from all {{tip|crowd control}}.
W.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Rengar stores 50% of the post-mitigation damage he has taken in the last 1.5 seconds as Health#Grey health on his health bar, increased to 100% of damage taken from monsters.
Active: Rengar roars, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and 65 − 130 (based on level) bonus magic damage to monsters, and consuming his Health#Grey health to heal for the same amount.
Ferocity Bonus: Battle Roar's damage is modified. Rengar cleanses from all crowd control.
W.notes: * ''Grey health'' will not be consumed upon casting ''Battle Roar'' despite visually appearing so. It will only ever expire after its duration ends.

effects.str: • Empowered Magic Damage: 50 − 220 (based on level) (+ 80% AP)

st_slices: 50 − 220 (based on level) (+ 80% AP)

E.name: Bola Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rengar''' throws a bola in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy hit and {{tip|slow|slows}} them for {{fd|1.75}} seconds, as well as {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them for 2 seconds and granting {{tip|sight}} of a 150-unit radius around them for the same duration.
{{sbc|Ferocity Bonus:}} ''Bola Strike's'' damage is modified. The target is {{tip|root|rooted}} instead of {{tip|slow|slowed}}.
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rengar throws a bola in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and slows them for 1.75 seconds, as well as revealing them for 2 seconds and granting sight of a 150-unit radius around them for the same duration.
Ferocity Bonus: Bola Strike's damage is modified. The target is rooted instead of slowed.
E.notes:
* If '''Rengar''' casts {{ai|Savagery|Rengar}} and/or {{ai|Battle Roar|Rengar}} during ''Bola Strike's'' cast time, he will buffer them and cast them when ''Bola Strike'' completes.
{{Effect at cast time end}}

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 80% bonus AD)
  • Slow: %
• Empowered Physical Damage: 50 − 305 (based on level) (+ 80% bonus AD)

st_slices: 50 − 305 (based on level) (+ 80% bonus AD)

R.name: Thrill of the Hunt
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Rengar''' also gains ''{{ai|Unseen Predator|Rengar}}'' while {{tip|camouflage|camouflaged}} from any source.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Rengar''' prowls for a duration, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}. After a 2-second delay, he also becomes {{tip|camouflage|camouflaged}}.

During this time, '''Rengar''' will detect the nearest enemy champion in range, {{tip|true sight|revealing}} and gaining {{tip|sight}} of a 100-unit radius around them. Enemies detected are {{tip|true sight|revealed}} for the remaining full duration.
The nearest detected enemy within 1600 range is also marked, alerting all of their allies within 1200 range about '''Rengar's''' presence.

'''Rengar's''' next basic attack within {{tt|normal attack range|125 range}} against any enemy or with ''Unseen Predator'' against the marked enemy deals {{as|50% AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|reduces their armor}}}} for 4 seconds.
R.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Rengar also gains Rengar's Unseen Predator while camouflaged from any source.
Active: Rengar prowls for a duration, gaining bonus movement speed. After a 2-second delay, he also becomes camouflaged.
During this time, Rengar will detect the nearest enemy champion in range, revealing and gaining sight of a 100-unit radius around them. Enemies detected are revealed for the remaining full duration.
The nearest detected enemy within 1600 range is also marked, alerting all of their allies within 1200 range about Rengar's presence.
Rengar's next basic attack within normal attack range against any enemy or with Unseen Predator against the marked enemy deals 50% AD bonus physical damage and reduces their armor for 4 seconds.
R.notes:
* ''Thrill of the Hunt's'' duration starts on-cast.
* The armor reduction applies ''after'' the attack.
* The {{tip|true sight}} reveal on the target stays until the leap finishes.
* '''Rengar''' discerns a distinct [[File:Thrill of the Hunt 3.png|24px]] ''heart beat'' instead of the usual {{tip|true sight}} indicator. This indicator will be removed when out of range, but the target will remain revealed.
